parameters.query: ={{ "SELECT tc.tenant_id, cf.id, cf.nom, cf.prenom, cf.email, cf.telephone, cf.raison_sociale FROM twilio_configs tc LEFT JOIN client_finals cf ON cf.telephone LIKE '%' || RIGHT('" + $('02. Parser Twilio').first().json.from + "', 9) || '%' WHERE tc.phone_number LIKE '%' || RIGHT('" + $('02. Parser Twilio').first().json.to + "', 9) || '%' LIMIT 1" }}

={{ "SELECT categorie, titre, contenu, mots_cles FROM agent_knowledge_entries WHERE tenant_id = '" + ($('11. Get Session').first().json.tenant_id || '') + "' AND actif = true ORDER BY categorie ASC, ordre ASC, created_at DESC" }}

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'gpt-4o-mini', messages: [{role:'system',content:$json.systemPrompt},{role:'user',content:$json.speechResult}], tools: JSON.parse($json.tools), max_tokens: 250, temperature: 0.5 }) }}

parameters.query: ={{ (function() { var d = $('14. Build TwiML Response').first().json; var safe = function(s) { return String(s || '').replace(/'/g, "''").substring(0, 500); }; var notes = safe('CallSid:' + d.callSid + (d.isAdmin ? ' ADMIN' : '') + (d.isProspect ? ' [PROSPECT]' : '') + (d.needsEscalation ? ' [ESCALADE]' : '') + ' - Q: ' + (d.speechResult || '') + ' - R: ' + (d.aiReply || '')); var urgency = d.needsEscalation ? 'URGENT' : 'STANDARD'; var sentiment = d.isProspect ? 'POSITIF' : 'NEUTRE'; return "INSERT INTO call_logs (tenant_id, caller_phone, direction, status, notes, urgency_level, sentiment, action_taken, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (COALESCE((SELECT id FROM tenants LIMIT 1), '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'), '" + safe(d.from) + "', 'entrant', 'completed', '" + notes + "', '" + urgency + "', '" + sentiment + "', 'REPONDU', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING id"; })() }}

={{ "INSERT INTO leads (
  tenant_id, nom, telephone, source, statut, notes, created_at, updated_at
) SELECT 
  (SELECT id FROM tenants LIMIT 1),
  'Appel entrant',
  '" + $('14. Build TwiML Response').first().json.from + "',
  'telephone',
  'nouveau',
  '" + 'Prospect détecté par agent vocal - Demande: ' + ($('14. Build TwiML Response').first().json.speechResult || '').substring(0, 300) + "',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM leads WHERE telephone LIKE '%' || RIGHT('" + $('14. Build TwiML Response').first().json.from + "', 9) || '%'
  AND statut != 'abandonne'
)
RETURNING id" }}

={{ (function() { var d = $('14. Build TwiML Response').first().json; var safe = function(s) { return String(s || '').replace(/'/g, "''").substring(0, 500); }; var type = d.isProspect ? 'lead' : 'alerte'; var titre = d.isProspect ? 'Nouveau prospect telephonique' : 'Escalade agent vocal'; var msg = safe((d.isProspect ? 'Prospect' : 'Escalade') + ' - Tel: ' + d.from + ' - ' + (d.speechResult || '')); return "INSERT INTO notifications (tenant_id, user_id, type, titre, message, lue, created_at) SELECT t.id, u.id, '" + type + "', '" + titre + "', '" + msg + "', false, NOW() FROM tenants t JOIN users u ON u.tenant_id = t.id AND u.role = 'super_admin' LIMIT 1 RETURNING id"; })() }}
={{ "SELECT notes FROM call_logs WHERE notes LIKE '%CallSid:' || '" + $('02. Parser Twilio').first().json.callSid + "' || '%' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10" }}
